description:
Stevie ...
This troop really gets reviewed in his scene. He's clearly nervous as hell to start and I don't help matters by throwing two huge dildo's at him and telling him to meet his new friends. Stevie is a sport though and he follows along with the game. I really work this guy over here, troops. Stevie is another guy that has been featured in our gallery, but this is his first video appearance. By the time I get done with him he's taken both dildos in his ass (while he smokes a cigarette) and shows me that he's ready for 'pass and review.' I really like Stevie and I'm sure you will too once you watch this scene where the guy is just so good about being a sport. Stevie is about 5'8' and weighs about a buck fifty. He's got a great little tight body and a hungry, willing ass and a great sense of 'suck it up and drive on' about him. Enjoy this scene for yourselves.
title: Stevie
